entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
